Name: Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds
Title: Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds
Desc: The gale gallops through the woods.

Talent.Name: Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds
Talent.Desc: Switch to the target character and creates 1 $[K411].\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
